product_name: SmartWool Outdoor Sport Ultra Light Mini Socks - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for a casual day hike, the lightweight, breathable SmartWool Outdoor Sport Ultra Light Mini Socks provide protection just above your low-top boots and shoes. Made from soft, ultralight merino wool blended with nylon and elastane, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer. 4-Degree Fit System for all-day performance fit. Reinforced heels and toes for durability. Strategic mesh ventilation zones. Flat-knit toe seams. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for a casual day hike, the lightweight, breathable SmartWool Outdoor Sport Ultra Light Mini Socks provide protection just above your low-top boots and shoes.
